text: Tales of the Alhambra (Spanish:Cuentos de la Alhambra) is a 1950 Spanish comedy film directed by Florián Rey and starring Carmen Sevilla, Aníbal Vela and Manuel Arbó.Nouselles p.280 The film is an adaptation of Washington Irving's 1832 short stories of the same title. ==Cast== In alphabetical order * Manuel Aguilera * Julio F. Alymán * Manuel Arbó as Ventero * Mario Berriatúa as Lucas * Raúl Cancio as Teniente * Francisco Cano * José Guardiola * Manuel Guitián * Casimiro Hurtado as Tío Pichón * José Isbert as Don Cosme - el escribano * José María Martín * Mari Carmen Obregón * Nicolás D. Perchicot as Gobernador * Santiago Rivero * Rosario Royo as Paquita * Carmen Sevilla as Mariquilla * Carmen Sánchez as Doña Tula * Luis Torrecilla * Aníbal Vela as Washington Irving * Juan Vázquez as Corregidor * Roberto Zara as Varguitas == References == ==Bibliography== * Nouselles, Alberto Mira. Historical Dictionary of Spanish Cinema. Rowman & Littlefield, 2010. == External links == * Category:1950 films Category:Spanish films Category:1950s historical comedy films Category:Spanish historical comedy films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films based on short fiction Category:Films based on works by Washington Irving Category:Films directed by Florián Rey Category:Films scored by Jesús García Leoz
title: Tales of the Alhambra (film)
